attributes.action: vote of no confidence in the current government and a call for a new election
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned have no confidence in the current Coalition governments ability to run the country and therefore wish that a new election takes place forthwith. The people of Britain did not vote for the coalition they voted for individual parties . It is plain to see that the coalition is not working and we the undersigned call for a new election before the damage done to this country is irreparable .

rejection.details: Votes of no confidence are a matter for Parliament and not the Government.
